Uses of Class
adept.io.EREDocument

  • Packages that use EREDocument 
    Package Description
    adept.io
    Provides I/O classes that handle reading/write files in different formats, including LDC Gigaword Corpus, ERE, CoNLL, email and plain text.

    • Uses of EREDocument in adept.io

      Methods in adept.io that return EREDocument 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      EREDocument Reader.readEREFile(String path, String docId, String language)
      Reads specified ERE file into an EREDocument (Document object wrapper).
